name: Username Logger
description: Collects usernames from nearby players and buddies, with integrated leak checking functionality
author: glvckoma

commands.name: setapikey
commands.description: Sets the LeakCheck API key. Usage: setapikey YOUR_API_KEY

commands.name: debug
commands.description: Shows debug information about the plugin state and API key.

commands.name: userlogpath
commands.description: Sets a custom directory for log files. Usage: userlogpath /path/to/directory

commands.name: userlogsettings
commands.description: Configure username logging settings. Usage: userlogsettings [setting] [value]

commands.name: leakcheck
commands.description: Run a leak check on collected usernames. Usage: leakcheck [all|latest|resume|limit]

commands.name: clearleaklogs
commands.description: Clear only leak check result files (not username logs).
